channel.title: We've had our first donation!
channel.description:
This morning I opened up my laptop, logged in, checked the Bitcoin wallet, and VIOLA, a kind individual has seen our fine platform, liked what we're doing, and decided to donate **0.0049 BTC**! All donations will be used in the running and development of the server.
Thank you kind person ;) We appreciate it a lot :slight_smile:
If anybody else wants to help keep our site on its feet, our BTC address is 1Hp1p87sryWfNd5jsVCMq5bK8zztUTsndx
If you'd like to use PayPal, then we can provide one. However I'm not sure how much demand there would be? Comment if you would like to donate with PayPal and we can make it happen!
Thanks! pry0cc

item.title: We've had our first donation!
item.dc:creator: pry0cc
item.description:
I had a thought it was you Cheers!

Read full topic

Your welcome!
